qrList.label: Update Presets
qrList.title: Downloads and updates all subscribed QRs.

qrList.label: enablepreset
qrList.message:
/setvar key=varname preset |
/run creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} right=true rule=eq "/qr-chat-set-on {{getvar::preset}} \| /run {{getvar::preset}}.init"

qrList.label: isvardefined
qrList.message:
/getvar {{getvar::varname}} |
/len | /setvar key=len |
/if left=len right=0 rule=lte else="/pass true" "/pass false"

qrList.label: shuffle
qrList.message:
/len {{getvar::arr}} | /setvar key=len |
/setvar key=i {{getvar::len}} |
/while left=i right=0 rule=neq "/run creamsan.shuffletoloop" |
/pass {{getvar::arr}}

qrList.label: shuffletoloop
qrList.message:
/rand from=0 to={{getvar::i}} round=floor |
/setvar key=i2 |
/addvar key=i -1 |
/getvar index={{getvar::i}} arr |
/setvar key=tmp |
/getvar index={{getvar::i2}} arr |
/setvar key=arr index={{getvar::i}} |
/setvar key=arr index={{getvar::i2}} {{getvar::tmp}}

qrList.label: pop
qrList.message:
/setvar key=i 0 |
/setvar key=i2 0 |
/flushvar newarr |
/len {{getvar::arr}} |
/while left=i right={{pipe}} rule=lt "/run creamsan.poptoloop" |
/pass {{getvar::newarr}}

qrList.label: poptoloop
qrList.message:
/if left=i right=topopidx rule=eq "/getvar index={{getvar::i}} arr \| /setvar key=popval \|
/addvar key=i 1 \| /abort" |

/getvar index={{getvar::i}} arr |
/setvar key=newarr index={{getvar::i2}} |
/addvar key=i 1 |
/addvar key=i2 1
